column4: cool, got those dapper xgl/compiz packages running on my laptop
great hey!
its good stuff, havnt got the cube zoom effects yet tho, but everything else seems alright
you notice apps launch faster?
yeah, i love that progs like vncviewer doesnt have to redraw itself when it gets covered up
that used to be painful
yer, most launch instantly
im pretty impressed, this is a laptop that can barely run quake 2!
runs smooth for you?
yeah, its not too bad atall
thats the great thing about Xgl, the hardware requirements are low
any clues to getting the cube effect going?
did you add it when you ran Xgl?
gconf decoration minimize move place resize rotate scale switcher wobbly zoom cube
the first time i ran it, it said something about the order of these
The keys are Ctrl, Alt, left and right arrow keys
its only giving me one workspace, whenever i change it it goes back to one
i dont think the effect loaded properly
add more work spaces
yeah, as i say it wont let me add any
the switch dont work for me when I try to add it
you want the starter script?
yeah please
